title: Ex-Louisville cop in deadly Breonna Taylor raid said colleagues were 'sitting ducks' - CNN
content:
1. Ex-Louisville cop in deadly Breonna Taylor raid said colleagues were 'sitting ducks'  CNN
  2. LIVE | Day 2: Brett Hankison wanton endangerment trial  WHAS11
  3. Officer who fired into neighbor's apartment in Breonna Taylor case faces jury  ABC News
  4. LIVE: Brett Hankison trial day 2, former police chief testifies  WLKY Louisville
  5. 'One or two inches more, I would have been shot,' says neighbor in Hankison trial  WAVE 3
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Brett Hankison, the only police officer charged in connection with the botched 2020 raid that left Breonna Taylor dead in her Louisville, Kentuckly, apartment, said he opened fire because he felt colleagues around him were "sitting ducks" being "sprayed with bullets."
